I'm trying to add a filter to an overrride for a specific site.  I
create the override, add a URIRegExp filter to it, and then go to the
settings page.  I add the reg exp to it, and click on Done With The
Override.  But when I go back into the override to edit it, the reg
exp that I entered for the new filter is gone, the field is blank. 
The filter is still present, but no reg exp.

Not sure if this is a bug, or if I'm doing something incorrectly or
missing something.

Thanks,
Rob.
